1.0.name: wordpress/internal-linking-for-scheduled-posts
1.0.description: If you write posts scheduled for the future and want to link between them, this can help! WordPress has a great, fast tool for linking to posts on your own site, but it only lists already-published posts. Usually this makes sense, but if you do a lot of writing for the future via scheduled posts you may want to expand that.
